name: Speed 3
description:
SPEED 3 - Too fast for fear

starring Sandra Bollocks and Keanu Queef

Dont  let the cars speed drop to zero or ull explode. press tab to get the bomb up and defuse it by getting all light 

to green. get a green light by pressing mouse button in the center.

CREDIT:

MUSIC: 

Geibral

https://pixabay.com/music/synthwave-analog-dreams-synthwave-9497/

SOUIND EFFECT GENERATED WITH:

Dr Petter

http://drpetter.se/project_sfxr.html

Car Driving Sound Effect:

Debsound

https://freesound.org/people/Debsound/sounds/278186/

CAR SPRITE from this asset by Yevheniy:

https://marketplace.yoyogames.com/assets/8659/car-example

controls:

W,S - up and down

space - shot

TAB - get bomb up

Left mouse button - to defuse bomb.

Escape  - quit
